item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, May 4, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I taught AI to commentate Pong in real time (48 points | 7 comments)
2. What went wrong with wireless USB (201 points | 104 comments)
3. Gorgeous-GRUB: collection of decent community-made GRUB themes (273 points | 74 comments)
4. Show HN: Free, in-browser PDF editor (539 points | 110 comments)
5. Oberon Pi (13 points | discuss)
6. DuckDB is probably the most important geospatial software of the last decade (316 points | 92 comments)
7. Switch bouncing reference traces for a variety of different switches (26 points | 14 comments)
8. Show HN: Voxdazz – Text-to-speech with lip-sync video generation (5 points | discuss)
9. Pascal for Small Machines (72 points | 8 comments)
10. Metagenomics test saves woman's sight after mystery infection (123 points | 41 comments)
11. Legendary Bose Magic Carpet Suspension Is Finally Going Global (166 points | 112 comments)
12. Time saved by AI offset by new work created, study suggests (362 points | 329 comments)
13. I built a pixel art editor after playing Octopath Traveler II (62 points | 26 comments)
14. Elvish – Powerful scripting language and versatile interactive shell (29 points | 14 comments)
15. A Survey of AI Agent Protocols (63 points | 29 comments)
16. Why can't HTML alone do includes? (305 points | 259 comments)
17. Programmers Guide to the AMIBIOS (1993) [pdf] (53 points | 15 comments)
18. Numerical Linear Algebra Class in Julia TUM (104 points | 4 comments)
19. Google Gemini has the worst LLM API (111 points | 90 comments)
20. When flat rate movers won't answer your calls (241 points | 162 comments)
21. Why I Am Not Going to Buy a Computer (1987) [pdf] (93 points | 53 comments)
22. A PostgreSQL planner semi-join gotcha with CTE, LIMIT, and RETURNING (44 points | 37 comments)
23. QModem 4.51 Source Code (191 points | 70 comments)
24. We fell out of love with Next.js and back in love with Ruby on Rails (375 points | 337 comments)
25. DotnetSnes: Library allowing to use C# to create SNES ROMs (32 points | 3 comments)
26. A simple Common Lisp web app (42 points | 10 comments)
27. Anatomy of a 'zombie' volcano: Investigating the cause of unrest inside Uturuncu (4 points | 1 comment)
28. Run LLMs on Apple Neural Engine (ANE) (255 points | 105 comments)
29. Why I stopped angel investing after 15 years (and what I'm doing instead) (202 points | 166 comments)
30. Minimum Viable Blog (328 points | 160 comments)
